reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_title: A regular regular, to keep you regular.
reviews.review_data: I won't be too graphic here, as we all know what these things do :)Suffice to say, they work very well. I've used lots of different brands over the years, and I have to say, these ones work the best so far. I imagine that has to do with the quality of the ingredients for which you have to pay a little more. But like everything in life, you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: I thought I reviewed this already. in fact, the only reason I am doing so now is because I have just sent the link to a friend who's son has issues with his digestion. I've had colitis for 6 years now, and this probably changed my life. I started constantly flaring a couple of years ago and lost over a stone and nothing I was doing was working. The meds stopped working and all the dietary changes I made had little to no effect.  I had read a few people saying that fibre had helped them, but I always under the impression that fibre is for people who have constipation, not issues with urgency and frequency that affect those with ibd or severe ibs. Then I watched a programme about the effects of fibre on the digestive system. Fibre it seems normalises the body functions, so it softens hard poo for those with constipation (which a lot of reviewers on here seem to attest to) But in addition, it also adds bulk the stool which slows down the speed which digestion takes place for those with ibd and ibs. For me after a week I noticed a difference and after a month a significant improvement which allowed my medication to resume working, and meant that I went virtually back to normal bowel habits. I also recommended this to another friend that had a different issue, which has meant they have been in and out of hospital and they have gone from a frequency of 8 times a day to 3, which is a lot better for them. I have heard people say Oh this doesn't work for me I've tried aloe vera ect not willing to give this a go. This isn't aloe vera. My body had a bad reaction that too. This is a soluble fibre, which is why it's great even as a supplement for ibs and ibd sufferers as some insoluble fibre can cause issues. Please give it a go for a week. It might just give you your life back.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: I'll be honest I bought these primarily to regulate my digestive system (aka, have "cleaner" poops). Really does make your bowel movements go to how they should be, solid and easy. I have two a day and does me just fine. Highly recommend.You can probably get fiber from elsewhere like vegetables for cheaper and healthier diet but if your busy student like me and need quick fix this is excellent.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: I think these husks have helped my constipation as I have diverticulitis.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: I'm really not sure what I was thinking when I bought these. I've been taking the recommended two capsules a day and not noticed any difference in my .... well you know what I'm talking about. Thinking about it logically, two of these provide 1 gram of fibre whereas a small serving of my fruit and bran flakes cereal provides 4 grams. Half a can of beans provides 12 grams. A slice of wholemeal bread .... you can see where I'm going with this. I'll finish the pot I've bought but I won't be buying again.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: This a good product. It's nothing life-changing, but it does have some effect. And I noticed it right away, within 24 hours. It has helped everything stay more clean and quick, and it's added a strange smell to stools, for some reason - nothing worse than normal (probably slightly less unpleasant), but strange to find something like that happen all the same!

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: - I find these very easy to take - compared to the powder, which I used to put in smoothies, blurg, thick and goopy...- At first I kept forgetting to take BETWEEN meals (not with, as they may block absorption of vitamins if taken with food), now I try to time taking one a chill out/coffee/cuppa breaks and no food.- I take one pill between breakfast and lunch (with a cuppa) and the same between lunch and dinner.  They are medium size, but easy to swallow veggie friendly gelatine free capsules.  No smell or taste, that repeats, so that is very good!  In combo with taking a probiotics before breakfast, this is great during periods of stress and irregular eating, just to keep your system balanced and healthy, and I am finding I feel clear headed and a bit more energised.  I think as part as an overall healthy lifestyle, these are really handy when I know I'm travelling a lot/eating out a lot - so I won't be getting in my green smoothies or be too rushed to cook as much veg - a quick fibre blast to keep the system happy.- HUGE bottle, 200 pills - lasting ages for a decent price.  Not the cheapest in the world, but I want reliable quality/a brand I trust -  Solgar have been good for everything I have tried - I also like their fish oil (incredibly high strength).- The dark glass is great for preserving quality, and I just jiffy bag a handful when travelling, in my handbag.

reviews.review_title: This product is amazing! I started taking it from 10 weeks ago ...
reviews.review_data: This product is amazing!  I started taking it from 10 weeks ago and I am feeling completely different.  Every morning I take 2 capsules out and put them into a cereal bowl without the capsules.  Then I add some oat bran and wheat bran (both in a ground-down form rather than in a stick form) and some warm water and mix them well with a spoon.  Some milk can be added.  I have continued this for 10 weeks and my constipation has been improved.  On top of this, my feet and hands are now very warm and my body feels generally warmer than before.  As I have always suffered from coldness, I feel now revitalised.  Maybe is this the result of developing a good “intestinal flora”???

reviews.review_data: I have bought this product a number of times - why? because they work. They come in 500mg capsules,so it is very convienient to take it twice daily.I have priced other brands and the conclusion I come to is that nothing else really compares,especially in quality.The fact that they come in vegetable capsules is a bonus as well;most other brands use a gelatine capsule which is not my preference at all.I think that the quantity that they come in is brilliant as this means that you don't have to re - order too frequently. They work,the price is good and they're a premium brand - is there anything else..?

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_title: I wouldn't touch this with a barge pole.
reviews.review_data: To simply put - It doesn't work! I've been constipated for over a week after taking these. Having  followed the recommended dose, reasonably healthy diet and hydration I can safely say that powdered form of psyllium husk is useless. My usual diet comprises of the following:Shredded wheat biscuits, mixed nuts and a few dates in breakfast. an apple around 11 am, lunch with a good mix of veg&fruits and tuna steak/grilled chicken breast, a pear or two later in the afternoon, dinner with pasta & chicken breast - water through out the day (4 litres).Had to do salt water flush to clean up.Buried the bottle deep in the backyard -- hope the neighbour's cat didn't see me digging.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: I used Lepicol Psyllium Husk before but it's starting to creep up in price.  Looking for an alternative, I found this which was slightly cheaper, and you get more capsules per jar.  It works just as well as Lepicol and if I'm starting to feel a bit *bunged up*, I take four capsules with a generous drink of squash and a few hours/ day later, I have a good healthy no.2 in the bathroom.I initially started taking psyllium husk in early 2017 because I was very constipated for 2.5 weeks and nothing I had tried worked. OTC and GP prescribed medicines didn't help relieve my constipation, but after trying pysillium husk, it got me moving again.  Amazing stuff, it's my go-to supplement for healthy guts and bowel movements and as a bonus, it's cured me of my IBS-D which was a nightmare itself.10/10

reviews.review_data: These have made a real difference to my digestion. I follow a low carb diet which tends to result in constipation - These work!I’d say it is really important to take them with a large glass of water as recommended, if you don’t they would probably cause you even more problem!

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: Definitely feel and see a difference from these capsules. Have bought again And will continue to do so. Helps with a host of ailments and issues that arise from the gut - whether you know them too or not - in the works of Hippocrates: 'All disease begins in the gut.'Before trying the Solgar PH capsules I was using fiber flakes/ power form and found this sometimes a handful to swallow, as it would absorb water in any drink making it very thick and hard to drink. I've always had regular bowel movements but after taking PH on a daily basis I noticed that bowel movements were much easier to pass and ha da somewhat less offensive smell shall we say. Not sure if I have IBS or what but I definitely get bloated from eating the wrong things and just generally when my diet is poor. I also get stomach upsets and gas. PH helps with all of that. I suspected last year that I may have candida or definitely somekind of yeast overgrowth, after doing extensive research on some random conditions I've been plagued with for years that my GP/ prescribed and over counter meds couldn't treat. I was looking for a natural, even holistic or Ayurvedic alternative to modern synthetic drugs that I'd recently discovered are all neurotoxins of some sort... Anyway, I suffered from yeast infections on and off for years, nothing I took or did could stop it. In my mid teens I also developed an excessively dry bottom lip that constantly peeled and chapped no matter what. After about 15 years, and through no help of the many GPs I'd consulted about my lip over the years, I eventually discovered the condition had a name, exfoliative cheilitis, and while i felt helpless to the fact that my lip constantly dried up and peeled off, at least I could cover the discoloured, sore, broken, bleeding skin under lipstick most of the time... needless to say that didn't help with the healing process, it was a viscous circle. I could never find much about causes for exfoliative cheilitis on the net, other than doctors the world over stating it a rare condition, and unsure of causes and cure... BUt then last year I came across a forum or a Pintrest article or something that indicated it was due to candida/ bacteria overgrowth and/or a problem in the lower insetting i.e. Gut. And images of Chinese medicine face mapping - how skin issues e.g. Spots, peeling, eczema on certain parts of the face are a sign of a problem with a organ in the body...I wasn't taking PH for candida but at some point I noticed my lips stopped drying up and peeling so it wasn't long before I turned to google to confirm that PH can help treat candida by cleaning up th gut somewhat. I have some small fibroaids and I've noticed an improvement in the way they feel, pain and size since taking PH. I used to talk the husk fibre in the daytime, normally in a breakfast smoothie but then I read somewhere that nighttime is best as PH can help you sleep. Since then I've been taking the capsules in the evening and haven't looked back.Long and short of it is. Do your reasearch - PH is great for so many things and it's natural. And if you have IBS, yeast, metabolic and skin issues you should definitely think about a colon cleanse e.g psyllium husk!

reviews.review_data: Amazing transformation to my body. Without going into great detail, after 8 months of (at times) regular, uncomfortable and frustrating diarrhoea, my bowels are completely back to normal after only 1 week of taking these. I really cannot believe the difference. I knew my diet didn’t include enough fibre and despite eating more fruit and veg nothing seemed to work, until this product. Amazed.

reviews.review_title: I take one a day with a full glass of ...
reviews.review_data: I take one a day with a full glass of water and it helps me not opening my bowel too often (i suffer ibs D). the only thing a bit anoying is that some people say that you should take it at the different time than other meds as it can can stop the meds absorbion in the intestine.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: These are highly effective fibre supplements that are low FODMAP friendly and take gradual effect in around 18 hours.It is however very important to ensure that your fluid intake levels are sufficient, and they should be taken with a large glass of water.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: I suffer from IBS-D and was going to use these as a more convenient alternative to fibregel which really helps with my bowel movements. Unfortunately these tablets had the opposite effect and gave me bad diarhhea so i had to stop immediately. Total waste of money for me.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: I've had IBS for as long as I can remember. I've tried many different supplements over the years without success. This has literally changed my life. For the first time EVER I have normal bowel activity. Previously, I could quite easily go to the toilet 5 times in the morning but stools were always loose. This often created a sore butt!Now, I go once a day, twice tops, and stool is no longer silly rabbit droppings.I take one in the morning and one before bedtime and this seems to do the trick. I can't recommend highly enough for anyone with IBS

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200

I thought I'd try these instead as a lower calorie alternative and they don't seem to work as well (or at all possibly).I suspect results may vary depending on your digestion and metabolism though, so you may get better results.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: Under the advisement of my colon hydrotherapist I am taking two of these on a daily basis, generally before bed. I have noticed very positive results. I tend towards dryness and constipation and these appear to provide bulk and produce a good, consistent morning result and I am feeling considerably better for it. I find these work well with regular water enemas at home, as well as the professional colonic sessions.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: I purchased these when embarking on a low carb diet. I had previously use Psyllium husk, although that was in the form that you mix with water to give a borderline bearable suspension. These capsules are so much easier, and seem to do the trick as long as you remember to drin plenty of water as well.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: Great help to control my IBS.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: Wow wow thank you Psyllium,I have had IBS D for over 20 years triggered by both food and stress. I have tried all prescription meds and more natural meds than I care to count...nothing has worked or has sometimes made it worse.Recently I had a bad flare up going 10-20 x a day for over 3 weeks I lost over a stone in weight and was at a very low point. I took one of these capsules an hour before food and on the very first day I took it I only went once and that was a normal consistency not watery like the previous 3 weeks....I was amazed I have been taking it for just over a week now and am going to the toilet every 2 to 3 days, I don't feel constipated or bloated so don't mind that. My stomach cramps and pains have also  decreased quite a lot some days none at all. I have tried this with foods that are not trigger foods but some that can occasionally effect me and I have been fine. It has also coped with a very stressful few days back at work.Theses amazing results may not last but even so I would still recommend trying it especially if your having a flare up.I cannot state enough how much this has changed my life...I can now leave the house and even went back to the gym.Please give it a go

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_data: Bought this because i was having real trouble when going to the toilet, was finding that i needed to wipe almost 20 times when taking a number 2 and even then i would later have to pay a visit to the toilet again later to clean up again, i had read somewhere online that it could be due to eating too many oily/faty foods that caused this, so i thought i would try these, took 2 pills a day for 3 or 4 days and didn't really do anything but then after that it was amazing, only have to wipe maybe 5 times now sometimes just once, and don't have to pay a re-visit later on, would definitely recommend trying these at least.

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200

reviews.title: Solgar Psyllium Husks Fibre 500 mg Vegetable Capsules - Pack of 200
reviews.review_title: Works as intended, helped lower my bad cholesterol and raise my good one
reviews.review_data: After my first blood cholesterol test at the age of 32 which surprisingly put me in the ‘High Risk’ category I purchased the following:CoQ10, Solgar Psyllium Husks Fiber 500 mg, Lindens Green Tea 1000mg, Broccoli Sprout Extract by LLS, BCAA Tablets | 1200mg, Magnesium Citrate 200mg, Omega 3 Fish Oil 1000mgThis, along with a better diet, helped me change my Cholesterol Score from 9.37 (7.03/0.75) to 3.44 (4.61/1.34) in 8 weeks. The doctor stated she had never seen a cholesterol turn around so quickly. I cannot attribute these tablets solely to this but as it was part of my new routine (1 a day) I intend to carry on. I was fit and active before the first doctor visit, however, my diet was very poor – High sat fats, no salad, no fish etc.Works as intended, helped lower my bad cholesterol and raise my good one – potentially a lifesaver. Easy to swallow without horrible flavours, no negative side effects noted.
